articles.author: Pilar Arias
articles.title: UK will ban American XL Bully dogs after series of recent attacks - Fox News
articles.description: British Prime Minister Rishi Sunak has described American XL Bully dogs as a “danger to our communities" and announced plans to ban them following public outcry.
articles.content:
American XL Bully dogs will be banned in the United Kingdom after British Prime Minister Rishi Sunak referred to them as a "danger to our communities" Friday.
The move comes after a public outcry fo… [+1988 chars]

articles.author: PTI
articles.title: NASA report finds no evidence that UFOs are extraterrestrial - Moneycontrol
articles.description: At a congressional hearing in July, former Pentagon intelligence officer David Grusch testified that the American government has been hiding evidence of crashed UAPs and alien biological specimens.
articles.content:
Tuscon (US), Sep 16 (The Conversation) NASAs independent study team released its highly anticipated report on UFOs on September 14, 2023.
